timeline.title: SR Holding's Journey Through Time
timeline.subtitle: We are a global partner in building industries, protecting assets, and shaping the future.

paragraphs: SR Holding continues to grow with 50+ successful projects delivered and 25+ clients across key industries. Our team now includes 15+ software professionals dedicated to high-quality solutions and client satisfaction.

images.alt: Modern server infrastructure with glowing lights representing secure IT systems
IT professionals collaborating in a modern workspace
Modern tech office showcasing digital innovation
Software development team collaborating on a project

paragraphs: We expanded our services to support fast-growing startups and SMEs, building trusted partnerships with regional clients who needed reliable software expertise.
Our portfolio grew to include custom software development, web and mobile applications, and database engineering to match increasing client needs.

images.alt: Software engineers collaborating on innovative solutions
Secure cloud infrastructure in a modern data center
Technology specialists discussing a new product roadmap
Digital workspace focused on product innovation

paragraphs: SR Holding was founded with a mission to deliver dependable software solutions. We began as a team of three developers, partnering with local clients on tailored projects.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Learn more about SR Holding's software development services and technology solutions.
FAQ.ctaDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help with any questions about our software development services.

faq1.question: What software services does SR Holding offer?
faq1.answer: We provide end-to-end software development services including web platforms, mobile applications, cloud solutions, AI integrations, and digital transformation consulting.

faq2.question: How can I contact SR Holding about a project?
faq2.answer: Reach out via our contact form, email hello@srholding.org, or call +359878908741. We'll review your requirements and propose the best solution.

faq3.question: Do you work with startups as well as enterprises?
faq3.answer: Yes. We partner with startups, scale-ups, and global enterprises, tailoring engagement models to project size, goals, and budget.

faq4.question: What sets SR Holding apart?
faq4.answer: We combine cutting-edge engineering, strategic consulting, and long-term partnerships. Our teams deliver secure, scalable products and provide continuous support.

faq5.question: Do you develop mobile applications?
faq5.answer: Absolutely. We build native and cross-platform mobile apps—from strategy and design to development and maintenance.

JoinTeam.testimonialsDescription: Discover what makes SR Holdings an extraordinary place to work—straight from the people who power our success.

testimonials.name: Slavi Kolev
testimonials.quote: People talk about scaling. I talk about taking over.

testimonials.name: Marin Nikolov
testimonials.quote: Sell the vision, not the product. People buy belief and emotion.

testimonials.name: Sean Isa
testimonials.quote: Growth isn't just a metric—it's a mindset. Every opportunity fuels exponential impact.

testimonials.name: Carlos Garza
testimonials.quote: My job is simple: translate ambition across borders and turn global vision into local dominance.

testimonials.name: Anton Georgiev
testimonials.quote: I don't lower targets. I increase actions, follow process, and make the right calls when it counts.

testimonials.name: Stoyan Tanev
testimonials.quote: I don't just close deals—I build relationships that turn bold ideas into real-world success stories.

JoinTeam.positionsDescription: Find the role that matches your ambition. We're always excited to meet exceptional talent.

openPositions.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
openPositions.description: Build scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies.

schema.description: Build scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies. Work with a talented team to create innovative software solutions that impact millions of users worldwide.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Knowledge of modern development practices and tools
responsibilities: Design and develop scalable web applications
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
schema.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

openPositions.title: Product Designer
openPositions.description: Design intuitive experiences for our next-generation software products.

schema.description: Design intuitive user experiences for our next-generation software products. Work closely with engineering and product teams to create beautiful, functional interfaces that users love.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field
Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe Creative Suite
Strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI design skills
Experience with user research and testing
responsibilities: Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and design systems
Collaborate with product and engineering teams
schema.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field

openPositions.title: DevOps Engineer
openPositions.description: Manage and scale our cloud infrastructure to support millions of users.

schema.description: Manage and scale our cloud infrastructure to support millions of users. Implement CI/CD pipelines, monitor system performance, and ensure high availability of our services.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
4+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
Strong experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automation tools
Experience with monitoring and logging systems
schema.educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
schema.experienceRequirements: 4+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience

metadata.title: Legal - Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Cookie Policy - SR Holding
metadata.description: Read SR Holding's privacy policy, terms and conditions, and cookie policy. Learn how we protect your data and the third-party services we use.
metadata.keywords: privacy policy, terms and conditions, cookie policy, data protection, SR Holding legal
metadata.openGraphDescription: Review SR Holding's privacy, terms, and cookie policies to see how we protect your data.

hero.title: Legal Information
hero.subtitle: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Cookie Policy

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.informationBody: SR Holding collects information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, contact us, or use our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide.
usageList: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
To communicate with you about our services
To process transactions and send related information
To send technical notices and support messages
To respond to your comments and questions
privacy.thirdPartyIntro: We use the following third-party services to enhance our website and services:

thirdPartyItems.name: Vercel
thirdPartyItems.description: We use Vercel for hosting and deployment of our website.

thirdPartyItems.name: Meta Pixel
thirdPartyItems.description: We use Meta Pixel for advertising and analytics to understand user behavior and improve our marketing efforts.

thirdPartyItems.name: Bunny Security
thirdPartyItems.description: We use Bunny for enhanced security and content delivery.

thirdPartyItems.name: Formspree
thirdPartyItems.description: All form submissions are processed through Formspree for secure data handling.

privacy.securityBody: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsBody: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us. To exercise these rights, please contact us at hello@srholding.org.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptanceBody: By accessing and using SR Holding's website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.licenseBody: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on SR Holding's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
licenseList: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
terms.availabilityBody: SR Holding reserves the right to modify or discontinue the service (or any part thereof) temporarily or permanently with or without notice. We shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the service.
terms.liabilityBody: In no event shall SR Holding, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the service.
terms.lawBody: These terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatBody: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
cookies.howIntro: SR Holding uses cookies for the following purposes:

howList.name: Essential cookies
howList.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly.

howList.name: Analytics cookies
howList.description: We use Meta Pixel to analyze website traffic and user behavior.

howList.name: Performance cookies
howList.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

howList.name: Security cookies
howList.description: Enhanced security through Bunny's content delivery network.

cookies.thirdPartyIntro: Our website may contain cookies from third-party services:

thirdPartyList.name: Meta Pixel
thirdPartyList.description: Used for advertising and analytics purposes.

thirdPartyList.name: Vercel
thirdPartyList.description: Platform-specific cookies for hosting and performance.

thirdPartyList.name: Formspree
thirdPartyList.description: Cookies related to form submission and processing.

cookies.manageBody: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. If you do this, however, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site and some services and functionalities may not work.
cookies.contactBody: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at hello@srholding.org.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.address: 1034 Al Wasl Rd, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
contact.note: For any questions regarding our privacy policy, terms and conditions, or cookie policy, please don't hesitate to contact us.
